title: [GAMEPLAY] When Twisted Fate with Musketeer skin under the 2nd turret.
body:
As the title said,  when Twisted Fate with Musketeer skin under the 2nd turret., the turret give him a shield. But this shield is under his body when he stops.
It looks not so nice. pls solve this bug:D{{champion:4}}

replies.body: Good catch! Thanks for the report!
